title: Lowest Methane Emissions from Transport
description: In 2023, Kiribati recorded one of the lowest methane emissions from transport, with only 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

title: Lowest New Business Registrations
description: In 2018, Kiribati had only 2 new businesses registered, one of the lowest numbers globally.

title: Highest Government Consumption Expenditure
description: In 2022, Kiribati's government consumption expenditure was 61.53% of GDP, one of the highest in the world.

title: Lowest Gross Domestic Savings
description: In 2022, Kiribati had a gross domestic savings rate of -62.39% of GDP, one of the lowest globally.

title: Lowest Out-of-Pocket Health Expenditure
description: In 2022, Kiribati had one of the lowest out-of-pocket health expenditures per capita at $1.71.

title: Highest Youth Not in Education, Employment, or Training
description: In 2020, 53.67% of Kiribati's youth were not in education, employment, or training, one of the highest rates worldwide.
